rect.style: fill-rule: evenodd; paint-order: markers stroke; fill: url('#gradient-0'); stroke-width: 13px; stroke: rgb(103, 23, 0); transform-origin: 248.579px 248.975px;

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 150px; font-weight: 700; text-transform: capitalize; white-space: pre;
